pageContext.claim: “They want to massively expand immigration during a global pandemic. Think of that. Maximize and massively expand immigration during this global pandemic, taking jobs from unemployed Americans, end all travel bans, including those from jihadist regions.”
pageContext.analysis: The notion that immigrants steal jobs is more complicated than Trump makes it seem. A report from Brookings explains that immigrants often fill jobs Americans do not want. Moreover, immigration often positively correlates with economic growth.
